    Class
    Description
    class 
    BufferDecoder
    Deprecated.
    Use FitsDecoder instead which provides a similar function but in a more consistent way and with a less misleading name.
    class 
    FitsDecoder
    Decodes FITS-formatted binary data into Java arrays (primarily for internal use)
